Natural Language Query: How many are there?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM country WHERE continent = 'Asia'

Natural Language Query: Which countries are in the continent of Europe?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM country WHERE continent = 'Europe' GROUP BY name

Natural Language Query: Of those, what are the names of those that have a population of 80000?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name FROM country WHERE continent = 'Europe' AND population = 80000

Natural Language Query: What countries are in North America?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM country WHERE Continent = 'North America'

Natural Language Query: Of those, which have surface area greater than 3000?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM country WHERE Continent = 'North America' AND SurfaceArea > 3000

Natural Language Query: What is the total population and average surface area of those countries?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT sum(Population), avg(SurfaceArea) FROM country WHERE Continent = 'North America' AND SurfaceArea > 3000

Natural Language Query: What are the names of all the cities?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM city

Natural Language Query: Which of those have a population between 160000 and 900000?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM city WHERE Population BETWEEN 160000 AND 900000

Natural Language Query: What are the different languages?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT LANGUAGE, count(*) FROM countrylanguage

Natural Language Query: Which one is spoken in the most countries?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT LANGUAGE, count(*) FROM countrylanguage GROUP BY LANGUAGE ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Tell me﻿ the director of the cartoon named 'Day of the Dark Knight!'
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Directed_by, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = 'Day of the Dark Knight!'

Natural Language Query: What is the channel of this cartoon?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Channel, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = 'Day of the Dark Knight!'

Natural Language Query: Give me the titles of all cartoon directed by 'Ben Jones' or 'Brandon Vietti'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Title, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Directed_by = 'Ben Jones' OR Directed_by = 'Brandon Vietti'

Natural Language Query: Show me all the information about the Italian TV Channels.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT series_name, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE Country = "Italy" GROUP BY series_name

Natural Language Query: How about the Polish TV Channels?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT series_name, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE Country = "Poland" GROUP BY series_name

Natural Language Query: Which country has the most of TV Channels? List the country and number of TV Channels it has.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel GROUP BY Country ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Channel FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "The Eyes of Despero!"

Natural Language Query: How about this channel's series name?

Natural Language Query: Tell me the number of different series names and contents in the TV Channel table.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(DISTINCT series_name) ,  count(DISTINCT content) FROM TV_Channel

Natural Language Query: Tell me the package option for the series named "Rock TV".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Package_Option, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Rock TV"

Natural Language Query: tell me the language of this series.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Language, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Rock TV"

Natural Language Query: List the language used least number of TV Channel. List language and number of TV Channel.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT LANGUAGE ,  count(*) FROM TV_Channel GROUP BY LANGUAGE ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Tell me the author of the cartoon "The Rise of the Blue Beetle!"
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Written_by, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "The Rise of the Blue Beetle!"

Natural Language Query: How about its director?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Directed_by, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "The Rise of the Blue Beetle!"

Natural Language Query: What is its TV Channel?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.series_name, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN Cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.Title = "The Rise of the Blue Beetle!"

Natural Language Query: tell me the country of the TV Channel for the series named "Sky Radio".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY Country

Natural Language Query: How about its content?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Content, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY Content

Natural Language Query: I want to know the title of all Cartoons showed on TV Channel with series name "Sky Radio".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.Title, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN Cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T1.series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY T2.Title

Natural Language Query: Tell me the rating of the episode named "Double Down".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Rating FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "Double Down"

Natural Language Query: How about the rating of the episode named "Keepers".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Rating FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "Keepers"

Natural Language Query: Okay, I want to know the top 3 highest Rating TV series. List the TV series's Episode and Rating.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Episode ,  Rating FROM TV_series ORDER BY Rating DESC LIMIT 3

Natural Language Query: tell me the weekly rank of the episode named "Emily".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Weekly_Rank, count(*) FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "Emily"

Natural Language Query: How about its share?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Share, count(*) FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "Emily"

Natural Language Query: tell me the minimum and maximum share of TV series.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT max(SHARE), min(SHARE), count(*) FROM TV_series

Natural Language Query: Tell me the rating of the episode titled "A Love of a Lifetime".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Rating, count(*) FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "A Love of a Lifetime"

Natural Language Query: How about its weekly rank?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Weekly_Rank, count(*) FROM TV_series WHERE Episode = "A Love of a Lifetime"

Natural Language Query: And What is its TV Channel?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.series_name, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN TV_series AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.Episode = "A Love of a Lifetime"

Natural Language Query: tell me the content of TV Channel with the series named "Sky Radio".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Content, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY Content

Natural Language Query: How about its language?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Language, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY Language

Natural Language Query: Okay, now I want to know the Episode of all TV series showed on TV Channel with series name "Sky Radio".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.Episode, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN TV_series AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T1.series_name = "Sky Radio" GROUP BY T2.Episode

Natural Language Query: Tell me the air date of the cartoon titled "Fall of the Blue Beetle!".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Original_air_date, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "Fall of the Blue Beetle!"

Natural Language Query: What is its production code?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Production_code, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "Fall of the Blue Beetle!"

Natural Language Query: tell me the production code and channel of the most recently aired cartoon.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT production_code, channel FROM cartoon ORDER BY original_air_date LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Tell me the cartoons directed by Ben Jone.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Title, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Directed_by = 'Ben Jones'

Natural Language Query: Tell me the cartoons written by Todd Casey.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Title, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Written_by = 'Todd Casey'

Natural Language Query: Which countries' tv channels are playing some cartoon written by Todd Casey?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.Written_by = 'Todd Casey'

Natural Language Query: which countries' tv channels are playing some cartoon written by Steven Melching?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.Written_by  =  'Steven Melching' GROUP BY T1.country

Natural Language Query: which countries' tv channels are not playing any cartoon written by Todd Casey?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel EXCEPT SELECT T1.country FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.written_by  =  'Todd Casey' GROUP BY country

Natural Language Query: Tell me the director of the cartoon titled "Deep Cover for Batman!".
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Directed_by, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "Deep Cover for Batman!" GROUP BY Directed_by

Natural Language Query: I want to know this cartoon's production code.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Production_code, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = "Deep Cover for Batman!" GROUP BY Production_code

Natural Language Query: Tell me the series name and country of the tv channel that is playing some cartoons directed by Ben Jones and Michael Chang.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.series_name, count(*) FROM TV_Channel AS T1 JOIN cartoon AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.Channel WHERE T2.directed_by = 'Michael Chang' OR T2.directed_by = 'Ben Jones' GROUP BY T1.series_name

Natural Language Query: tell me the country of the TV channel with series named "MTV Music"
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Country, count(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE series_name = "MTV Music"

Natural Language Query: Tell me the number of Italian channels.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TV_Channel WHERE Country = "Italy"

Natural Language Query: find id of the tv channels that from the countries where have more than two tv channels.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id FROM tv_channel GROUP BY country HAVING count(*) > 2

Natural Language Query: Who is the director of the cartoon titled "Return of the Fearsome Fangs!"?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Directed_by, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Title = 'Return of the Fearsome Fangs!'

Natural Language Query: Tell me the cartoons directed by Ben Jones.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Title, count(*) FROM Cartoon WHERE Directed_by = 'Ben Jones'

Natural Language Query: Find the id of tv channels that do not play any cartoon directed by Ben Jones.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, count(*) FROM TV_Channel EXCEPT SELECT channel FROM cartoon WHERE directed_by = 'Ben Jones'

Natural Language Query: Show all the poker players.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: How many are there?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: What is the earnings of each poker player?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Earnings, count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: Sort them in descending order.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Earnings, count(*) FROM poker_player ORDER BY Earnings DESC

Natural Language Query: Show all the information about each poker player.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: What are their final table mades?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT final_table_made, count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: What are their final table mades and best finishes?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT final_table_made, count(*), best_finish FROM poker_player GROUP BY best_finish

Natural Language Query: What is the earnings of each poker player?

Natural Language Query: Give me the average.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT avg(Earnings), count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: What is the money rank of each poker player?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Money_Rank, count(*) FROM poker_player GROUP BY Money_Rank

Natural Language Query: Sort them in the decreasing order.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Money_Rank, count(*) FROM poker_player GROUP BY Money_Rank ORDER BY count(*) DESC

Natural Language Query: Return the top one.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Money_Rank, count(*) FROM poker_player GROUP BY Money_Rank ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Which poker player has earnings less than 200000?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, earnings FROM poker_player WHERE earnings < 200000

Natural Language Query: Among them, what is the maximum number of final tables made?

Natural Language Query: Show all the poker players.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, count(*) FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: What are their names?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.people_id = poker_player.people_id

Natural Language Query: Which poker players have earnings higher than 300000?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, earnings FROM poker_player WHERE earnings > 300000

Natural Language Query: What are their names?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.people_id = poker_player.people_id WHERE poker_player.earnings > 300000

Natural Language Query: What are the names of all poker players?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.People_ID = poker_player.People_ID

Natural Language Query: Sort them in the ascending order of the final tables made.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, Final_Table_Made FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.People_ID = poker_player.People_ID ORDER BY Final_Table_Made ASC

Natural Language Query: What is the birth date of each poker player?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Birth_Date, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.People_ID = poker_player.People_ID

Natural Language Query: Sort the list by the poker player's earnings.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Birth_Date, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.People_ID = poker_player.People_ID ORDER BY poker_player.Earnings

Natural Language Query: Give me the result for the player with the lowest earnings.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Birth_Date, count(*) FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.People_ID = poker_player.People_ID ORDER BY poker_player.Earnings ASC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What is the height of each poker player?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Height, count(*) FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID

Natural Language Query: Who has the largest height?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT * FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID ORDER BY T1.Height DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What is his or her money rank?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.Money_Rank, count(*) FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID ORDER BY T1.Height DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What is the height of each poker player?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Height, count(*) FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID

Natural Language Query: Who all have heights greater than 200?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT * FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID WHERE T1.Height > 200

Natural Language Query: What is the average earnings among them?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT avg(T2.Earnings), count(*) FROM people AS T1 JOIN poker_player AS T2 ON T1.People_ID = T2.People_ID WHERE T1.Height > 200

Natural Language Query: Sort all the poker players in descending order of earnings.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT poker_player_id, earnings FROM poker_player ORDER BY earnings DESC

Natural Language Query: What are the names of poker players in descending order of earnings?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, earnings FROM people JOIN poker_player ON people.people_id = poker_player.people_id ORDER BY earnings DESC

Natural Language Query: Show the nationality of each person.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality FROM people

Natural Language Query: Group people by their nationality.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT * FROM people GROUP BY Nationality

Natural Language Query: For each of the result, show the corresponding number of people of that nationality?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality ,  COUNT(*) FROM people GROUP BY Nationality

Natural Language Query: Show the nationality of each person.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality FROM people

Natural Language Query: Count the number of people for each nationality.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT COUNT(*) FROM people GROUP BY Nationality

Natural Language Query: What is the most common nationality of people?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality FROM people GROUP BY Nationality ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Count the number of people for each nationality.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality, count(*) FROM people GROUP BY Nationality

Natural Language Query: Which nationalities are held by at least two people?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Nationality, count(*) FROM people GROUP BY Nationality HAVING count(*) >= 2

Natural Language Query: What are the names and birth dates of people?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, Birth_Date FROM people

Natural Language Query: Sort the results in ascending alphabetical order of name.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, Birth_Date FROM people ORDER BY Name ASC

Natural Language Query: What are the names of all people?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, count(*) FROM people

Natural Language Query: What about people whose nationality is not "Russia"?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Name, count(*) FROM people WHERE Nationality != "Russia"

Natural Language Query: Show all the poker players.
VQL: SELECT * FROM poker_player

Natural Language Query: Show all people who are not poker players.
VQL: SELECT * FROM people WHERE People_ID NOT IN (SELECT People_ID FROM poker_player)

Natural Language Query: Give me their names.
VQL: SELECT Name FROM people WHERE People_ID NOT IN (SELECT People_ID FROM poker_player)

Natural Language Query: What are the death tolls each time?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT killed, count(*) FROM death

Natural Language Query: What is the maximum number of deaths in any one time?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT max(killed), count(*) FROM death

Natural Language Query: What about the minimum?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT min(killed), count(*) FROM death

Natural Language Query: Give me the maximum and also the minimum.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT max(killed), min(killed), count(*) FROM death

Natural Language Query: Show me information about deaths caused by ships.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, sum(killed) FROM death JOIN ship ON death.caused_by_ship_id = ship.id GROUP BY name

Natural Language Query: Only ships with tonnage 't'.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, sum(killed) FROM death JOIN ship ON death.caused_by_ship_id = ship.id WHERE ship.tonnage = 't' GROUP BY name

Natural Language Query: Only return the death and injury information for those ships.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT killed, injured FROM death JOIN ship ON death.caused_by_ship_id = ship.id WHERE ship.tonnage = 't'

Natural Language Query: What are the ids and names of the battles?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, name FROM battle

Natural Language Query: Only show those that ships were lost in.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT DISTINCT T1.name FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle

Natural Language Query: Please, just the ones with 'Brig' ship type.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT DISTINCT T1.id, T1.name FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.ship_type = 'Brig'

Natural Language Query: How many people were killed or injured in each battle?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.name, sum(T3.killed) FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle JOIN death AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.caused_by_ship_id GROUP BY T1.name

Natural Language Query: Only show the deaths for those battles that produced at least ten deaths.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.name FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle JOIN death AS T3 ON T2.id = T3.caused_by_ship_id GROUP BY T1.name HAVING sum(T3.killed) > 10

Natural Language Query: List the injuries caused by each ship (give ship id and name please).
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.id, T2.name, sum(T1.injured) FROM death AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.caused_by_ship_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.id

Natural Language Query: Sort it by decreasing number of injuries.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.id, T2.name, sum(T1.injured) FROM death AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.caused_by_ship_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY sum(T1.injured) DESC

Natural Language Query: Only show the ship id and name that caused the most total injuries.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.id, T2.name FROM death AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.caused_by_ship_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.id ORDER BY sum(T1.injured) DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Which battles did the bulgarian commander 'Kaloyan' fight in?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM battle WHERE bulgarian_commander = 'Kaloyan'

Natural Language Query: How about the latin commander 'Baldwin I'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM battle WHERE latin_commander = 'Baldwin I'

Natural Language Query: Just the ones where they were fighting one another, please.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, count(*) FROM battle WHERE bulgarian_commander = 'Kaloyan' AND latin_commander = 'Baldwin I'

Natural Language Query: Which battle ids lost ships with tonnage '225'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT lost_in_battle, count(*) FROM ship WHERE tonnage = '225' GROUP BY lost_in_battle

Natural Language Query: Give the names of these battles, too.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.id, T2.name, count(*) from ship AS T1 join battle AS T2 ON T1.lost_in_battle = T2.id WHERE tonnage = '225' GROUP BY T2.id, T2.name

Natural Language Query: Which battle ids and names did not lose any ship with tonnage '225'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, name, count(*) FROM battle WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT lost_in_battle FROM ship WHERE tonnage = '225' ) GROUP BY id, name

Natural Language Query: How many is that?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM battle WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT lost_in_battle FROM ship WHERE tonnage = '225' )

Natural Language Query: List the name and date of the battle that has lost the ship named 'Lettice'
VQL: SELECT T1.name , T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name = 'Lettice'

Natural Language Query: Same for 'HMS Atlanta', please.
VQL: SELECT T1.name , T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name = 'HMS Atlanta'

Natural Language Query: Can you intersect those?
VQL: SELECT T1.name , T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name = 'Lettice' INTERSECT SELECT T1.name , T1.date FROM battle AS T1 JOIN ship AS T2 ON T1.id = T2.lost_in_battle WHERE T2.name = 'HMS Atalanta'

Natural Language Query: Which battle ids and names lost ships in the 'English Channel'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, count(*) FROM battle JOIN ship ON battle.id = ship.lost_in_battle WHERE ship.location = 'English Channel' GROUP BY id

Natural Language Query: Which did not?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, count(*) FROM battle EXCEPT SELECT id FROM battle JOIN ship ON battle.id = ship.lost_in_battle WHERE ship.location = 'English Channel' GROUP BY id

Natural Language Query: For these ones, show their names, results, and bulgarian commanders.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT name, RESULT, bulgarian_commander, count(*) FROM battle EXCEPT SELECT name, RESULT, bulgarian_commander FROM battle JOIN ship ON battle.id = ship.lost_in_battle WHERE ship.location = 'English Channel' GROUP BY name, RESULT, bulgarian_commander

Natural Language Query: How many continents are there?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM CONTINENTS

Natural Language Query: Show all their ids and names!
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT ContId, Continent FROM CONTINENTS

Natural Language Query: What countries do they each have?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.ContId, T1.Continent, * FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId = T2.Continent

Natural Language Query: Count how many there are for each continent name and id!
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.ContId, T1.Continent, count(*) FROM CONTINENTS AS T1 JOIN COUNTRIES AS T2 ON T1.ContId = T2.Continent GROUP BY T1.ContId

Natural Language Query: What are the names and ids of the different car makers?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT FullName, ID FROM CAR_MAKERS

Natural Language Query: What countries are they each from?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Country, FullName, ID FROM CAR_MAKERS

Natural Language Query: For each, how many models do they each produce?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*), T1.Country, T1.FullName, T1.Id FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker GROUP BY T1.Id

Natural Language Query: Can actually just show the name, id and the number of models?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.FullName ,  T1.Id ,  count(*) FROM CAR_MAKERS AS T1 JOIN MODEL_LIST AS T2 ON T1.Id  =  T2.Maker GROUP BY T1.Id

Natural Language Query: What is the average horsepower of all cars?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT avg(horsepower) FROM CARS_DATA

Natural Language Query: How about the maximum?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.horsepower FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id ORDER BY T2.horsepower DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What about the minimum?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.horsepower FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id ORDER BY T2.horsepower ASC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What is the model of the car with this horsepower?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.Model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId  =  T2.Id ORDER BY T2.horsepower ASC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: What is the average weight of all the cars?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA

Natural Language Query: List all the car information with weights above this?
VQL: Visualize CIRCLE SELECT * FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId = T2.Id WHERE T2.Weight > (SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA)

Natural Language Query: How about below this?
VQL: Visualize CIRCLE SELECT * FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId = T2.Id WHERE T2.Weight < (SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA)

Natural Language Query: Please, show just their model names!
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T1.model FROM CAR_NAMES AS T1 JOIN CARS_DATA AS T2 ON T1.MakeId = T2.Id WHERE T2.Weight < (SELECT avg(Weight) FROM CARS_DATA)

Natural Language Query: What are the ids, and models of the cars were made in 1970?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT id, model FROM cars_data WHERE year = '1970'

Natural Language Query: Show their horsepower and MPG as well?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT horsepower, mpg, model FROM cars_data WHERE year = '1970'

Natural Language Query: Also provide the names of their makers!
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Maker, horsepower, model FROM CAR_MAKERS JOIN MODEL_LIST ON CAR_MAKERS.Id = MODEL_LIST.Maker JOIN CAR_NAMES ON MODEL_LIST.model = CAR_NAMES.model JOIN CARS_DATA ON CAR_NAMES.MakeId = CARS_DATA.id WHERE CARS_DATA.year = '1970'

Natural Language Query: Just show a unique list of all these different makers.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT DISTINCT Maker FROM CAR_MAKERS JOIN MODEL_LIST ON CAR_MAKERS.Id = MODEL_LIST.Maker JOIN CAR_NAMES ON MODEL_LIST.model = CAR_NAMES.model JOIN CARS_DATA ON CAR_NAMES.MakeId = CARS_DATA.id WHERE CARS_DATA.year = '1970'

Natural Language Query: Show me the makes and models of each car!
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT Make, Model FROM Car_Names

Natural Language Query: Also provide which the year they were produced?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.Make, T2.Model, T1.Year FROM CARS_DATA AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.Id = T2.MakeId

Natural Language Query: Which ones been produce in the earliest year?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT T2.Make, T2.Model, T1.Year FROM CARS_DATA AS T1 JOIN CAR_NAMES AS T2 ON T1.Id = T2.MakeId WHERE T1.Year = (SELECT min(YEAR) FROM CARS_DATA)

Natural Language Query: Show just the make and year!

VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM professionals WHERE state = 'Wisconsin'

Natural Language Query: List the role code ,  street ,  city ,  state from the above results.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT role_code, street, city, state FROM professionals WHERE state = 'Wisconsin'

Natural Language Query: What about those professionals who live in a city containing the substring 'West'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT role_code, street, city, state FROM professionals WHERE city LIKE '%West%'

Natural Language Query: Show the states of the owners.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT state, count(*) FROM Owners GROUP BY state

Natural Language Query: How many of them are from 'Vermont'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Owners WHERE state = 'Vermont'

Natural Language Query: List the first name, last name and email of the owners who lives in the states that has the substring 'North'.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM Owners WHERE state LIKE '%North%'

Natural Language Query: Order the dog ages in descending order.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT age, count(*) FROM Dogs ORDER BY age DESC

Natural Language Query: How many of them are below 4?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Dogs WHERE age < 4

Natural Language Query: What about the ones that are below the average?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Dogs WHERE age < (SELECT avg(age) FROM Dogs)

Natural Language Query: Show the treatment details.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT treatment_id, cost_of_treatment FROM Treatments

Natural Language Query: Order the cost in ascending order.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT cost_of_treatment, count(*) FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost_of_treatment ASC

Natural Language Query: What about in descending order?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT cost_of_treatment, count(*) FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost_of_treatment DESC

Natural Language Query: Which one is the most recent cost?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT cost_of_treatment, count(*) FROM Treatments ORDER BY date_of_treatment DESC LIMIT 1

Natural Language Query: Show all the owner information.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT owner_id, count(*) FROM Owners

Natural Language Query: What about the dogs?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Dogs

Natural Language Query: Among those, how many of them have been sent to receive treatment?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id IN ( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments )

Natural Language Query: What about those who did not?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Dogs WHERE dog_id NOT IN ( SELECT dog_id FROM Treatments )

Natural Language Query: Show all the owner information.
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT * FROM Owners

Natural Language Query: How many of them come from the state of 'Arizona'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Owners WHERE state = 'Arizona'

Natural Language Query: What about those who do not have any dogs temporarily?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Owners WHERE owner_id NOT IN ( SELECT owner_id FROM Dogs )

Natural Language Query: How many professionals are there?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Professionals

Natural Language Query: How many of them come from 'West Heidi'?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Professionals WHERE city = 'West Heidi'

Natural Language Query: What about those who did not operate any treatment on dogs?
VQL: Visualize BAR SELECT count(*) FROM Professionals WHERE professional_id NOT IN ( SELECT professional_id FROM Treatments )
